titleInfo.title: Historical Sketches of the Davidson County Schools, compiled by Julia McClung Green, 1952

mods.identifier: Historical Sketches Davidson County Schools by Julia Green

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A typescript of "Historical Sketches of the Davidson County Schools," compiled by Julia McClung Green, 1952. The Table of Contents: Introduction--Dedication--Acknowledgements--Elementary Schools: Alex Green--Andrew Jackson--Andrews, Julia--Antioch--Berry--Bordeaux--Burton--Cane Ridge--Dodson--DuPont--Early--Edenwold--Ewing--Forest Grove--Goodlettsville--Gower--Hamilton--Harpeth Valley--Inglewood--Jere Baxter--Joelton--Jordonia--Joy--Lickton--Mills--Mims--Morny--Morrow Headden--Mt. View--Neely's Bend--Oglesby--Old Center--Parmer--Richland--Robertson Academy--rosemont--Shwab--Stokes--Stratton--Turner--Tusculum--Una--Union Hill--Wade--Woodbine--Woodmont. High Schools: Antioch High--Bellevue High--Central High--Cumberland High--Donelson High--DuPont High--Isaac Litton--Joelton High. New Schools (after 1952): Dalewood--John B. Whitsitt--Julia Green--Rosemont- name changed to Margaret Allen--Mt. View--Amqui--Thompson Lane--Brick Church--Martha Vaught--Providence. Forms part of Publications, Typescripts Collection (Ref. 370.9768 H673).
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. Please contact: Metro Nashville Archives, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5880.
